```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(caret)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)


filtered<- read.csv("C:\\Users\\Clars\\Downloads\\all_vars_28_apr_2.csv")
 filtered$Hour<- as.factor(filtered$Hour)

```
Chosen Model:
```{r}
train_control<- trainControl(method = 'cv', number = 10)

nb1<-train(n ~ Year + Hour + Temp + precip +
            broncos + rockies + nuggets +
            Spring + Summer + M_Th + Fri,
           data = filtered,
           trControl = train_control,
           method = 'glm.nb')
print(nb1)
```
Base Model:
```{r}
nb2<-train(n ~ Hour,
           data = filtered,
           trControl = train_control,
           method = 'glm.nb')
print(nb2)
